{

    -khtml-user-select: none;

        touch-action: pan-y;
    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
}

{
    position: relative;

    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;

    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

{
    outline: none;
}

{
    cursor: pointer;
    cursor: hand;
}

{

         -o-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
            transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
}

    top: 0;
    left: 0;

    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;

}

class="features-list-container"><div class="features-list all-features"><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">Windows 11 Home operating system</h4><p class="body-copy">Brings back the Start menu from Windows 7 and introduces new features, such as the Edge web browser that lets you mark up web pages on your screen.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">Ryzen 7</h4><p class="body-copy">Imagine, design, and create without boundaries. The powerful AMD Ryzen 7 processor features machine intelligence that anticipates your needs. Discover true responsiveness with 8 cores and 16 threads for the ultimate performance.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">16GB system memory for intense multitasking and gaming</h4><p class="body-copy">Reams of high-bandwidth DDR4 RAM to smoothly run your graphics-heavy PC games and video-editing applications, as well as numerous programs and browser tabs at the same time.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">1TB hard drive and 500GB solid-state drive (SSD) for a blend of storage space and speed</h4><p class="body-copy">The hard drive provides ample storage, while the SSD delivers faster start-up times and data access.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 graphics</h4><p class="body-copy">Backed by 6GB GDDR6 dedicated video memory, this fast, advanced GPU will fuel your games.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">Eight USB ports maximize high-speed devices</h4><p class="body-copy">Its USB 3.0 ports are backward compatible with USB 2.0 devices at 2.0 speeds.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">Wireless and wired network connectivity</h4><p class="body-copy">Built-in high-speed wireless LAN connects to your network on the 802.11ac Wi-Fi standard. The Gigabit Ethernet LAN port plugs into wired 10/100/1000 networks.</p></div><div class="list-row"><h4 class="feature-title body-copy v-fw-medium">Additional ports</h4><p class="body-copy">HDMI output for a high-definition monitor or HDTV.
